text:
Religion

Sri Hanumath Jayanthi Mahotsava Committee: Sri Mathva Navarathri Mahotsavam, Sri Raghavendra Swamy Brindavanam, Sullivan Street, 6 p.m.

General

Avinashilingam University: Tirupur Rathinasamy Samiammal memorial talk, 2 p.m.

Karpagam Academy of Higher Education: Seminar on “Novel Approaches in Cancer Therapeutics”, 10.10 a.m.; interaction programme for MBA students, 10 a.m.

Dr. N.G.P. Arts and Science College: Lecture on “Food processing applications for the biopharmaceutical industry”, 2.30 p.m.; State-level inter-collegiate meet – Math Fest 2016, 9.15 a.m.; Seminar on Opportunities in the apparel sector, 10 a.m.

G.R. Damodaran Academy of Management: Program on “Entrepreneurial journey”, 10 a.m.

IDP Education: Australian Education Fair 2016, Vivanta by Taj, 2 p.m.

Coimbatore Institute of Management and Technology: Workshop on “Mobile application development”, 10 a.m.

Kumaraguru College of Technology: Inter- college techno cultural fest “KCT Yugam 2016”, 9.30 a.m.

Kurinji Hospital: Continuing Medical Education Program, 2 p.m.

Mnemonics Learning Centre: Workshop on “Learning strategies for the parents of Dyslexic students”, R.S. Puram, 10 a.m.

Sri Ramakrishna Engineering College: Lecture on “Essentials of Working Capital Management”, 1.30 p.m.

Dr. G.R. Damodaran College of Science: Conference, Advances in Information Technology and Networking, 10 a.m.
title: Coimbatore today
